appUpdateDesc: A new mySobrero version has been released, update now to continue using the app.
loggedAsParent: You're logged in mySobrero as a parent.
parentNotice:
By using a parent account mySobrero still works, but some features may not be available, like son profile filtering, internal surveys or access to Snacks@Sobrero.
If you're a student and you're using your parents' account, request yours at Administrative Secretary to take full advantage of mySobrero.
contributesTo: Questa assenza concorre al calcolo delle ore totali
ssoInvalidrequest: The client has generated an invalid request, to protect your security the procedure has been aborted.
ssoSharedData: Verranno condivisi i tuoi dati anagrafici, la tua classe e il tuo numero di matricola. La tua password non verr√† condivisa.
ssoDialog2: with your mySobrero account, make sure the application is trusted before granting any access.
ssoSuccess: You have successfully logged in, You'll be redirected to the application in a few seconds.
ssoPointQR: Point your device at the QR code to authorize the application.
noAssignments: Nessun compito trovato per il periodo selezionato
noMarks: Nessun voto trovato per il periodo selezionato
noTopics: Nessun argomento trovato per il periodo selezionato
noReports: Pagella non disponibile per il periodo selezionato
actionsMenuDesc: Use this menu to switch between pages and services offered by mySobrero.
clickToContinue: Touch the highlighted area to continue the tutorial.
summaryButtonsDesc: These tiles show a brief summary of the corresponding category, touching them opens the linked detail page.
settingsButtonDesc: Touch this button to reload all data shown in the Application.
clickToEnd: Touch the highlighted area to end the tutorial.
ANOTHER_DEVICE_CONNECTED: Another device has signed in mySobrero, to preserve your security, this session has been terminated. To continue using the app, reopen it and do the login.
COVID19_INFO_DESC: Acceptance of the policy is mandatory to access to school permises.
COVID19_POLICY_READ_CAREFULLY: Please read carefully the following policy
COVID19_POLICY_TERMS: By clicking the accept button you're acknowledging and agreeing the Sobrero's COVID-19 Policy
SNACKS_ORDER_POLICY: Your snack will be delivered the next day you ordered it, o the same day if purchased by 8 AM
LESSON_TOPICS_DESC: Visualizza gli argomenti delle lezioni della settimana
CAREER_DESC: Visualizza la tua intera carriera scolastica, dalla prima ad adesso
HANDOUTS_DESC: Organize and download your teachers' handouts
RADAR_DESC: Report a problem in mySobrero with Radar
RADAR_DESC_FULL: Report a problem in mySobrero with Radar, the bug check platform of mySobrero
RADAR_DATA_INCLUDED: What data will be sent on Radar
RADAR_DATA_DEVICEID: Device identifiers (brand, model, OS Version etc.)
RADAR_DATA_SESSION: Current session data, such as notices, marks and assignments. No sensitive data will be sent.
